text: Vladimir Mićović (Serbian Cyrillic: Bлaдимир Мићовић; born October 11, 1975 in Aranđelovac) is a retired Serbian football goalkeeper and current goalkeeping coach of Neftchi Baku . In May 2014 Mićović rejoined his old club Neftchi Baku as a goalkeeping coach. == References == ==External sources== * Profile and stats until 2003 at Dekisa.Tripod. title: Vladimir Mićović
